short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unuglifying exam.edu.np and other ioe sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The exam.ioe.edu.np is ugly at best in the UI.
This extension is a (kind of) workaround.
Currently only fixes the student login page(https://exam.ioe.edu.np/studentLogin/index).

More work in progress.
